alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:18PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wibaux and southeastern Dawson Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 517 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of West Glendive, or 10 miles northwest of Glendive, moving east at 20 mph. Another strong storm was located 5 miles west of Wibaux, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and small hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glendive, Wibaux, Intake, West Glendive, Hoyt, Hodges, Forest Park, Stipek, Marsh, Saint Phillip and Yates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Montana.
